AfterMovie.Text: ประทับใจจัง! ฉันหวังว่าหนังจะมีภาคต่อนะ!

BeforeMovie.Text: เฮ้...ฉันได้ยินว่าเรื่องนี้มันดีมากเลยละนะ!

AfterMovie.Text: หนังมันดีมากเลย! ขอบคุณที่ชวนฉันมานะ!

BeforeMovie.Text: ฉันว่าหนังเรื่องนี้ไม่ใช่แนวฉันน่ะแต่ว่าฉันจะลองไปหาดูละกัน...

AfterMovie.Text: ขอโทษทีนะที่ฉันทำให้เธอดูหนังไม่สนุกน่ะ,มันไม่ใช่แนวหนังที่ฉันชอบน่ะ...

BeforeMovie.Text: โอ้, '{0}'! ฉันเคยดูหนังเรื่องนี้กับ {2} แล้วล่ะ!

อืม, ฉันจำได้ว่า {2} เคยพาฉันมาดูเรื่องนี้แล้ว...

AfterMovie.Text: เฮ้, หนังมันก็สนุกดีนะ!

BeforeMovie.Text: เค้าบอกกันว่าหนังเรื่องนี้มัน 'แหวกแนว'... มันหมายความว่ามันแย่หรอ?$s

AfterMovie.Text: เรื่องนี้จะสื่ออะไรเนี่ย? ดูไม่ค่อยรู้เรื่องเลย บางทีฉันอาจแก่เกินหนังเรื่องนี้แล้วก็ได้$s

BeforeMovie.Text: *ฝุด* *ฝิด* ... ฉันได้กลิ่นความอร่อย...

AfterMovie.Text: ไม่เลวเลย ฉันโชคดีที่ได้มาดูหนังเรื่องนี้!

BeforeMovie.Text: ฉันเคยดูหนังคาวบอกตอนฉันเป็นเด็ก... ฉันดีใจที่หนังยังคงเป็นเหมือนเมื่อก่อน!

DuringMovie.Script: /message "Mayor Lewis seems deep in thought..."
DuringMovie.Text: (I wonder what kind of moustache wax he uses?)

AfterMovie.Text: Heh, that was great! Really brought me back...$h

BeforeMovie.Text: The governor himself recommended this movie to me!

AfterMovie.Text: Fantastic! They really made Stardew Valley look beautiful, didn't they? If only they had featured Pelican Town itself...$h

BeforeMovie.Text: As mayor, I need to know what kinds of movies are being shown in our community. We have the tender minds of the next generation to worry about!

AfterMovie.Text: Hah! That wasn't bad at all... I'd say this one's 'Mayor Approved'.$h

BeforeMovie.Text: Hmm... I guess it will be interesting to see what the young people are watching these days...

AfterMovie.Text: Huh... I wonder if the messages in this movie are good for our community?

BeforeMovie.Text: I saw this movie once, a long time ago. It's very romantic!

AfterMovie.Text: That was lovely... The theme of the movie really resonated with me. Thanks for bringing me!

BeforeMovie.Text: I hope the seats are plush, I've been on my feet all day!

AfterMovie.Text: I'm not much of a movie buff... but I had a good time! Thanks, @.

BeforeMovie.Text: Oh man, I'm so excited for this! I heard it has a great soundtrack.

DuringMovie.Script: /playSound reward/emote Sam 32/message Sam "Sam can't contain his laughter!"
DuringMovie.Text: This movie's hilarious! How do they come up with this stuff?$h

AfterMovie.Text: *psst*... Don't tell anyone, but I wear the same type of socks as Wumbus.

BeforeMovie.Text: So you like scary movies, huh? I'm a little surprised!

AfterMovie.Text: That was pretty good! I'm usually not scared by movies, but that one got to me a little... I don't think I'll take Vincent to see this.

BeforeMovie.Text: Hey, thanks for inviting me, @... It's really great that we have a movie theater in town now.

AfterMovie.Text: That wasn't bad! I might have to take Vincent to see this.

BeforeMovie.Text: It's an old movie with lots of talking, right? Hmm... $s

DuringMovie.Script: /message Sam "Sam is playing his handheld video game system."
DuringMovie.Text: Huh? Oh! Yeah... The movie's... interesting...$10

AfterMovie.Text: Yeah... Uh... That one character was interesting... And, um... heh...$10

BeforeMovie.Text: I'm so excited! My mom said I can have candy, too!$h

DuringMovie.Script: /jump Vincent/pause 400/playSound reward/message "Vincent is having a blast!"

AfterMovie.Text: That was so fun! I wanna go see it again!$h

BeforeMovie.Text: B... But... This movie is for grown-ups, isn't it?$s

DuringMovie.Script: /shake Vincent 250/pause 500/shake Vincent 250/pause 500/emote Vincent 28/message "Vincent is fidgeting in his seat."

AfterMovie.Text: That was boring... I didn't understand anything.$s

BeforeMovie.Text: Thanks for inviting me to the movies, @. It's not easy to adjust back into the civilian lifestyle, but you've helped me feel really welcome.

DuringMovie.Script: /emote Kent 32/message "Kent has a rare smile on his face."
DuringMovie.Text: This is great... it reminds me of simpler times...$h

AfterMovie.Text: That was fun. When you're engrossed in a movie, all your cares and worries disappear.

BeforeMovie.Text: I'm not sure about this movie...

DuringMovie.Script: /emote Kent 28/message "Kent is breaking out into a cold sweat..."

AfterMovie.Text: That was challenging for me. Still, I appreciate you inviting me to this.

BeforeMovie.Text: This movie's supposed to be a romance, right? *sigh*$s

DuringMovie.Script: /emote Clint 12/message "Clint is scowling."
DuringMovie.Text: Why would she like THAT guy? Totally unrealistic if you ask me...$3

AfterMovie.Text: That movie was depressing...$s

BeforeMovie.Text: I guess it's 'guys night', huh? Does that mean I have to buy my own snacks?^Oh... A... Are we on a date, then?$4

DuringMovie.Script: /message "Clint is taking sips from an unmarked flask."
DuringMovie.Text: It's just... *hic*... Joja Cola.$h^*whispers*...If you're, um... tired... you can put your head on my... my shoulder. Heh... or not!$4

AfterMovie.Text: Hey... that was kind of fun... right?$h

BeforeMovie.Text: I ate a handful of nuts to prepare for this movie... brain food!

AfterMovie.Text: I feel a little bit smarter than I was before... don't you?

BeforeMovie.Text: When I saw the movie poster for this one, I felt a very positive sensation in the top of my head.$h

AfterMovie.Text: That movie felt very spiritual, in a way... don't you agree? I loved it!$h

BeforeMovie.Text: I'm happy to see a movie with you! I tend to get totally lost in the screen.

AfterMovie.Text: I feel positive after that one... that means it was a good movie!$h

BeforeMovie.Text: I usually go to more positive movies, so this will be interesting.

AfterMovie.Text: My energy levels are low after that one...$3

AfterMovie.Text: That was very romantic.

BeforeMovie.Text: Mmm... It's nice and warm in here. Winter is my favorite time to go to the movies.$h

BeforeMovie.Text: It's a sci-fi movie, right? One of the things I like about sci-fi is seeing all the weird technologies they come up with.

AfterMovie.Text: Well, I've never seen anything like *that* through my telescope... but it was really great!$h

BeforeMovie.Text: I really like going to the theater, even if the movie's bad!$h

AfterMovie.Text: That was an interesting choice, for the final scene. What do you think they meant by that?

BeforeMovie.Text: Hey. I heard this movie is pretty grim... I'm looking forward to it.$h

BeforeMovie.Text: *shrugs*... The movie poster looked pretty cool, so I'm in.

AfterMovie.Text: It wasn't the best ever, but I had a pretty good time... thanks for inviting me.

BeforeMovie.Text: I hope it's short...

AfterMovie.Text: It's probably a fine movie for the target audience, but it's just not for me.

BeforeMovie.Text: I've been feeling kind of dull lately, so an action-packed movie is exactly what I need.

AfterMovie.Text: I'm all fired up, now! That was great.$h

BeforeMovie.Text: I'm not sure what this movie's about, but I don't really care! It's just good to get out of the house.

AfterMovie.Text: That was a lot of fun, @. I'm glad we did this.

BeforeMovie.Text: A short jaunt in the snow really gets the blood flowing.

AfterMovie.Text: Great movie... but I wonder if there really is life beyond this planet?

BeforeMovie.Text: I foresee this to be an exquisite night!
